cs301.group8.meta
Class PictureListAdapter

java.lang.Object
  
      cs301.group8.meta.PictureListAdapter

public class PictureListAdapter
extends

PictureListAdapter creates the custom list that will be used to populate the results of the search and the BlemishActivity list view. Each 'view' element contains a small thumbnail image, a checkbox (hidden in search), the time that the picture was taken, and the [X] button which allows for deletion

Version:
2.0
Author:
Group 08

Method Detail

getView

public View getView(int position,
                    View convertView,
                    ViewGroup parent)
getView takes in the position of the view of the ListAdapter and sets buttons and their listeners. The remove button allows the user to delete that image The titleText TextView shows the time that the picture was taken The checkButton CheckBox allows the user to perform "batch operations" The image ImageView displays the image in a thumbnail

Parameters:
position - Integer value of the position in the list
Returns:
view Returns the associated view
